name: fabricator-starter
description: A starter toolkit for your fabricator based toolkit.
author: Dieter Geerts <dieter@dworks.be>

scripts.start: cd .. && cd fabricator && npm start -- --config="../fabricator-starter/fabricatorConfig.json" --buildConfig="../fabricator-starter/buildConfig" && cd .. && cd fabricator-starter
scripts.build: cd .. && cd fabricator && npm run build -- --config="../fabricator-starter/fabricatorConfig.json" --buildConfig="../fabricator-starter/buildConfig" && cd .. && cd fabricator-starter
